biography: David L. Lander was born on June 22, 1947 in Brooklyn, New York, USA as David Leonard Landau. He was an actor and writer, known for Laverne & Shirley (1976), Who Framed Roger Rabbit (1988) and Used Cars (1980). He was married to Kathy Fields and Thea (Pool) Markus. He died on December 4, 2020 in Los Angeles, California, USA.
name: David L. Lander
